Description: A glazed composition model of a pottery vase closed with a mud seal: the vase is conical, the sides converging to a pointed base. Originally glazed green, but the glaze has considerably decayed to white and has flaked off in places. The top of the object is slightly broken.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Temple of Osiris-Khentimentu (Abydos), Chamber M69 Deposit
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' II (London, 1902-4), 26 and pl. VII, 127.
